recentwork1.description: Website and brand identity project for the Interactive Elementary Learning Center to boost credibility and increase participation in their free 7-week summer program.

recentwork2.description: Website project for Bloom and Vine a boutique floral design studio located in Northern California. Bloom and Vine strives to make every event unforgettable.

recentwork3.description: We developed the website for NVSI, promoting research and collaboration in fields related to contemporary Vietnam's economic, political, and cultural development.

recentwork4.description: Oneloop is a team of graduate and undergraduate students at UCD. They design and build a Hyperloop pod to compete in SpaceX's annual Hyperloop competition.
